title: Big FACTS feat. BIG SCARR
itunes:title: Big FACTS feat. BIG SCARR
description:
Memphis rapper and 1017's own Big Scarr discusses linking with Gucci Mane, his cousin Pooh Shiesty, new music, the streets and more.
